title: Intelligent Tutoring Systems and Active Inference
description: Design and implementation of intelligent tutoring systems using Active Inference for personalized education.
learning_objectives: Design intelligent tutoring systems using Active Inference

content.overview: Intelligent tutoring systems use artificial intelligence to provide personalized instruction and feedback to students. Active Inference provides a framework for building tutoring systems that model student knowledge, predict learning outcomes, and adapt instruction to maximize learning efficiency.
